author: MZ_1
title: Merlok 2.0
review:
This is my next LEGO Magazine.

Packaging / Instructions
The set is packed in a foil bag, larger than usual. Unfortunately, it cannot be reused - you can tear it apart or cut it open. There are detailed instructions in stock that are relatively unnecessary.

Minifigures
There are no figures in the set - the Merlok hologram is one brick, which I will discuss later.

Parts
With this set, we get some useful parts. The silver "spider web", transparent Antenna 1 × 4 with Rounded Top and the Merlok hologram are the most interesting of them. In addition, we get several robotic arms, parts for the base and elements of a cane, including a transparent 1 × 1 pyramid.
The Merlok hologram that I was talking about is nicely printed, and the identical only appears in 70317: The Fortrex, so it's a nice deal.

Overall
Great selection of parts for a reasonable price. Perfect if you don't want to buy the big Nexo Knights wave sets but want Merlok.
